snippet: The combined company would be a big supplier of cranes and heavy equipment, with estimated revenue of about $10 billion a year.
abstract: Terex Corp and Konecranes will merge in all-share deal to create combined company with estimated revenue of about $10 billion annually; new entity Konecranes Terex would become major supplier of cranes and equipment to the construction, mining, manufacturing and shipping sectors.
lead_paragraph: The combined company would be a big supplier of cranes and heavy equipment, with estimated revenue of about $10 billion a year.

headline.main: Terex Corporation and Konecranes of Finland Agree to Merge
